subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Red Sox reached an agreement with the Dodgers on a trade that would send three of their most expensive players — first baseman Adrian Gonzalez, left fielder Carl Crawford and starter Josh Beckett — to Los Angeles.
snippet: The Red Sox reached an agreement with the Dodgers on a trade that would send three of their most expensive players — first baseman Adrian Gonzalez, left fielder Carl Crawford and starter Josh Beckett — to Los Angeles.
